thread.title: Woman removed from flight as passengers boo
thread.title_full: Woman removed from flight as passengers boo

title: Woman removed from flight as passengers boo
text:
Woman removed from flight as passengers boo Passenger was crying over apparent miscommunication with flight attendant POSTED: 07:52 AM PDT Oct 13, 2015 UPDATED: 07:50 AM PDT Oct 13, 2015 Tweet KATU; AMATEUR VIDEO 
Passenger Bill Byrne on a Portland, Oregon-bound American Airlines flight said he filmed a woman getting thrown off the flight for what he said was no good reason. Related Content El Chapo now a popular Halloween costume 
The alleged expulsion reportedly resulted from a miscommunication between the woman and a flight attendant who needed the aisle cleared, according to a KATU report. 
The woman seen in Byrne's video can be heard crying and saying "I didn't even know he was talking to me," and "This can't be legal." 
Byrne's video includes fellow passengers booing at the alleged decision to boot the woman from the flight. 
Another passenger told KATU that she was going to file a complaint over the way the woman was treated on the flight. Distributed by LAKANA.
